file_content.text: We've got droids attacking the ship! We can't maintain a comm channel!
Can you hear us? They're using the Foundry's weapon systems to hold back our fleet--you need to take control!
Three more Republic cruisers have been destroyed, but they're not retreating.
Objection: My master promised you would die horribly at my hands. At this rate, you'll perish well before then.
Observation: This assault is hardly an adequate test of Foundry defenses. Please provide more organic meatbags to slaughter.
Imperative: Extermination units converge on intruders. Psycholocutor and observer specialties report to tactical control.
Imperial destroyer Firelance has gone critical. The Republic fleet is holding steady.
We're monitoring the fleet battle... the Republic's surrounded the Foundry. We won't be getting reinforcements.
We'll stay behind to defend the step and guard your escape route. Good luck.
Imperial ships have jumped out of hyperspace. Lock down all sections! Repeat, lock down!
